LocationUnitArrayProvider

This object calculates arrays with units which can spawn locations of different sides.  Calculating these arrays is a resource-consuming and it must not be performed very often, that's why we need a separate object for this.

Functions
New
Delete
getUnitArray

Returns array of units that can spawn locations of given _side

Parameters: _side

_side

side

Returns: Array with object handles of objects that can spawn locations of given side
